alert.note: Alert for Davidson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 3:54PM CDT until July 08 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Davidson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 353 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Nashville, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Madison, Goodlettsville, Forest Hills, Oak Hill, Lakewood, Old Hickory, Hermitage, Antioch, Berry Hill, Percy Priest Lake and Whites Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 205 and 221. Interstate 65 between mile markers 77 and 95. Interstate 24 between mile markers 41 and 61. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
